scene.name: intro
scene.option: You have a way of falling behind, don't you?
I bet you come from a big family of dogs.

scene.name: falling-behind
scene.option: Me, I'm always too far ahead.

scene.name: ahead
scene.option: It's just the way I am.
Maybe I should slow down a bit, like you.

scene.name: family
scene.option: Yeah, dogs have big families. I like that.
Well, I have a pretty good-sized family too, I guess.

scene.name: big-families
scene.option: You're always surrounded by family. Sounds nice.
Seems easier to keep track of them.

scene.name: ezra-family
scene.option: But right now all I need is Julian.
I guess we'll see the rest of them pretty soon.
